trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Brooklyn Park
There were no other sightings in Brooklyn Park on or around October 20th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt first I had thought it might of been a helicopter or airplane, but noticing how bright the light was and how slowly it was moving towards me I shortly realized that it couldn't of been a craft of the US. At the time I was playing a video game and talking with my little sister and girlfriend. I heard a voice in my head telling me to turn around and look out the patio door of our apartment building. I turned and saw a very bright light that at first looked like a star. The object was moving slowly in my direction which made me believe it was a plane or helicopter. As it got closer I realized that it couldn't of been anything of that sort, since it was in fact noiseless. As it moved closer and closer it actually disappeared.
Summary: I had spotted a large bright light in the sky coming towards me moving eastbound.
